name: SciMax
overview:
SciMax is popularizing and commercializing Ukrainian R&D and technology projects.

Ukraine is a country with high level of technical and scientific education and a well-established web of research institutions and laboratories. It presents substantial resource of highly- innovative intellectual property, accumulated in the country during the last decade.

Activity of SciMax is aimed at popularization of the Ukrainian hi-tech projects for the broader business community with the aim of attracting venture capital into hi-tech projects. SciMax provides support for innovative start-ups on the stage of finding an investor and offers outsourcing of business processes (control of financial transactions, management, accounting, reporting, legal aspects) on the after-funding stage.

SciMax collaborates with a number of Ukrainian top universities and research institutions, governmental bodies and private technology companies, representing these organizations in negotiations with the potential investors and business partners.
